item.title: Weeks 1-4
item.description: Tuesday, August 27 Recitation: Join me today at 1-1:50pm ET for our first live online recitation as we discuss the course, look over the syllabus, and answer any questions that you may have. Use the link on the recitation page of the Course Handbook to join the meeting. Reading Lecture Video Duration Notes Online HW (graded) Textbook HW (ungraded) 0.1 Functions and Their Graphs 22 Notes Section 0.

item.title: Weeks 5-8
item.description: Tuesday, September 24 We have recitation scheduled for today at 1-1:50pm ET Reading Lecture Video Duration Notes Online HW (graded) Textbook HW (ungraded) 2.2 The First and Second Derivative Rules 20 Notes Section 2.2 2.2: 1-37(odd) 2.3a The First Derivative Test 17 Notes Section 2.3a Thursday, September 26 Exam 1 is scheduled for today at 8:45pm-10:15pm ET (it is a 1.

item.title: Weeks 9-12
item.description: Tuesday, October 22 Recitation We have recitation scheduled for today at 1-1:50pm ET Lectures Below are the three lectures assigned for this week. Reading Lecture Video Duration Notes Online HW (graded) Textbook HW (ungraded) 4.2 The Natural Exponential Function 22 Notes Section 4.2 4.2: 7-43(odd) 4.3 The General Exponential Rule 15 Notes Section 4.3 4.3: 1-31(odd) 4.4 The Natural Logarithm Function 14 Notes Section 4.

item.title: Weeks 13-16
item.description: Tuesday, November 19 Recitation We have recitation scheduled for today at 1-1:50pm ET Lectures Below are the two lectures assigned for this week, all due on December 3rd. Reading Lecture Video Duration Notes Online HW (graded) Textbook HW (ungraded) 6.4a The Area Between a Curve and the x-Axis 26 Notes Section 6.4a 6.4: 1,5-11(odd), 31, 45 6.4b The Area Between Two Curves 27 Notes Section 6.
